Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm back.

I've been trying to keep up with this thread (and others) via my phone while I was away, but didn't do so well. Once I get through all the discussion I'll update the first post.

Edit: first post edited. Did I miss anything?

Edited December 29, 2014 by WanderingKid
I've confirmed that you can't reuse an old satellite for a new contract, even if you launch a different satellite, and adjusted the first page appropriately.
